page.title: 12 Street Games
page.content: {Double Balls} This is a game played mostly by girls. It is where you have two balls which are thrown against a wall. It is a lot like juggling as the balls come at you one after the other. {Jacks This is a game played by boys and girls. The game has six small plastic "jacks" and a ball. The idea is to bounce the ball and pick up so many jacks, beginning with one, then two and so on. Finally you have to try to pick up all six jacks during one bounce of the ball. {Queeny The game is played mostly by girls. One girl is Queeny and she throws the ball behind her. Whoever catches the ball has to hide it and {Queeny}has to try and guess who has it. A wrong guess and the ball hider is{Queeny.
